alert.note: Alert for De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 13 at 12:25AM CDT until October 13 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN DE SOTO...SOUTHERN RED RIVER...WEST CENTRAL NATCHITOCHES AND NORTHERN SABINE PARISHES... At 1225 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Coushatta, or 12 miles east of Mansfield, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Coushatta, Pleasant Hill, Edgefield, Lake End, Evelyn, Grand Bayou, Hanna, Rambin, Armistead and Ajax. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine
